pullrequest.title: Fix timeout for speed regression test

content.raw:
On my system in debug mode, gazebo_1.2 `time speed` results in:

~~~
real	1m46.127s
user	2m11.528s
sys	0m2.000s
~~~

and similarly, gazebo_1.3 timed speed

~~~
real	4m0.545s
user	4m24.693s
sys	0m2.676s
~~~

it just about doubled.  Do we know what caused this behavior?
content.html:
On my system in debug mode, gazebo_1.2 time speed results in:

real    1m46.127s
user    2m11.528s
sys 0m2.000s

and similarly, gazebo_1.3 timed speed

real    4m0.545s
user    4m24.693s
sys 0m2.676s

it just about doubled. Do we know what caused this behavior?
